tool_description: Dataset of over 450 Ketogenic diet recipes in over 10 categories from Breakfast to Dinner.  Check out encurate.app to manage content on your mobile apps. Contact to feature your app on encurate.app website.
name: Keto Diet
title: Keto Diet

api_list.name: Filter - Protein
api_list.description:
Gives keto recipes within given range of protein value.
protein_in_grams__lt = Less than
protein_in_grams__gt = Greater than

api_list.name: Filter - Carbohydrates
api_list.description:
Gives keto recipes within given range of carbohydrates value.
carbohydrates_in_grams__lt = Less than
carbohydrates_in_grams__gt = Greater than

api_list.name: Filter - Fats
api_list.description:
Gives keto recipes within given range of fat content.
fat_in_grams__lt = Less than
fat_in_grams__gt = Greater than

api_list.name: Filter - Calories
api_list.description:
Gives keto recipes within given range of calories.
calories__lt = Less than
calories__gt = Greater than

api_list.name: Filter - Cook Time in Minutes
api_list.description:
Gives keto recipes within given range of cooking time.
cook_time_in_minutes__lt = Less than
cook_time_in_minutes__gt = Greater than

api_list.name: Filter - Prep Time in Minutes
api_list.description:
Gives keto recipes within given range of preparation time.
prep_time_in_minutes__lt = Less than
prep_time_in_minutes__gt = Greater than

api_list.name: Keto Recipes by Difficulty
api_list.description: Gives all keto recipes by its difficulty (Easy, Medium or Difficult).

api_list.name: All Keto Recipes by Category
api_list.description: Gives all keto recipes by category ID.

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: Lists all available categories of keto recipe.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://keto-diet.p.rapidapi.com/categories/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keto-diet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Keto Recipe
api_list.description: Gives all recipes by the search term.

api_list.name: Single Keto Recipe
api_list.description: Gives a single recipe by ID

api_list.name: All Keto Recipes
api_list.description: Get a list of all available keto recipes.
